text:
@BBCNews @bbclaurak "[Reuters] Review contradicts Boris Johnson on [his PMQs] claims he ordered early lockdown at UK care homes"

Reuters confirms it.  He didn't.  We knew he didn't.  Loved ones died because he didn't.

Please let people know.

https://t.co/zajEr63E3z
